```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(testthat)
library(splines)
library(furrr)
library(doParallel)
library(cowplot)

library(demotvmedg)
```

```{r}
dat0 <- readRDS("../Data/tvmed_dat100_12mo.RDS")

cl <- makeCluster(8)
registerDoParallel(cl)
```

```{r}
op <- tvmedg(data = dat0,
       fix = c("age","sex","ow","risk"),
       expo = c("Ap"),
       med = c("Mp"),
       tvar = c("L1","L2","L3"),
       outc = c("Yp"),
       lag = 3,
       norev = c("Mp"),
       time = c("mm"),
       LM = T,
       boot = F,
       seed = 123,
       mreg = "binomial",
       lreg = c("binomial","gaussian","gaussian"),
       yreg = "binomial",dof = 3,
       montecarlo = 100,length = 12,
       parallel=TRUE,nboot = 5,ci=.95)
```

```{r}
#| out-width: "100%"

plot(op,"cumY")

plot(op,"tvY")
```
